grouping_on_one_item_page.description: Items made from the same fabric should be grouped together.
Items with the same print should be grouped together.
Items with the same neckline should be grouped together.
Items with the same sleeve length should be grouped together.
Items available in multiple colors should be grouped together.

items_not_grouped.description: Items made from different fabrics should not be grouped together.
Items with different prints or patterns should not be grouped together.
Items with different necklines should not be grouped together.
Items with different sleeve lengths should not be grouped together.
Items in plus sizes should be considered for separate grouping.

summary: The Apparel Grouping Standards outline the criteria for grouping items based on shared characteristics like fabric, print, neckline, sleeve length, and color. It also specifies attributes that should not be used for grouping, such as differing fabric or print patterns, and advises that plus sizes be grouped separately.
